question: If breaching HQ is replaced with another effect, such as gaining 2 with [Security Testing](/en/card/31024), will the Runner get the additional access with [Docklands Pass](/en/card/30013) if they make a successful run on HQ again later in the turn?
answer: Yes. “The first time you breach HQ” refers to a breach actually taking place, not just reaching the “Breach the attacked server.” step of the run.
